mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(rc.id) FROM mdate_table AS mt LEFT JOIN rec_test AS rc ON DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(rc.rec_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND ${spe} = 1 WHERE date_format(mt.date,'%Y-%m')= #{yearMonth} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY mt.date;

SELECT COUNT(rc.id) FROM mdate_table AS mt LEFT JOIN rec_test AS rc ON DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(rc.rec_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND ${spe} = 1 WHERE date_format(mt.date,'%Y')= #{year} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY mt.date;

SELECT mt.date,COUNT(rc.id) FROM mdate_table AS mt LEFT JOIN rec_test AS rc ON DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(rc.rec_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND ${spe} = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(mt.date,'%Y') ORDER BY mt.date;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(rec_time, '%m') as month FROM rec_test WHERE DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%Y')= #{year} GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(rec_time, '%m') as month FROM rec_test WHERE DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%Y')= #{year} AND rec_test.spe = 1 GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rec_test WHERE date_format(rec_time,'%Y')=#{year} AND rec_test.spe = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%M') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%M');
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(rec_time, '%d') as day FROM rec_test WHERE DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%Y-%m')=#{yearMonth} AND rec_test.spe = 1 GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rec_test WHERE DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%Y-%m')=#{yearMonth} AND rec_test.spe = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(rec_time,'%d');
